alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Frio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 12:41AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Frio and Atascosa Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1240 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Pearsall to 6 miles north of Los Angeles. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pleasanton, Pearsall, Jourdanton, Poteet, Charlotte, Christine, North Pearsall, Goldfinch, Bigfoot, Schattel, Leming, Iuka, Kyote, Davis, Coughran, Dobrowolski, Amphion, McCoy, Rossville and Hindes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
